entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
